players.name: Alice
memory:
Charlie: "I am the detective and I know Bob is mafia.
"
Charlie: "I will investigate Alice and Diana to gather more information on the case."
Bob: "Charlie is the detective, he will investigate Alice and Diana. I am innocent."
You: "I am innocent and I have no idea what happened to Diana. Let's work together to find out the truth."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
